name: The Mailman Strikes Again
description:
A job as a mailman might seem easy and relaxing, not yours though . The world is experiencing a big crisis , the internet stopped working!!
Now people are going back to physical mail with all social media now offline. As a mailman you must sort all the mail before time runs out!

Who make this unexpected game?

Aaron Hui - 3D Artist

Andrew Han - Programmer/Level Designer/UI

Nicolae Filat - Programmer/UI

Chris Taylor - 3D Artist
